title: Betis ´devastated´ by Chelsea Conference League collapse, says Pellegrini
description: Manuel Pellegrini described his Real Betis players as “devastated” after a second-half collapse saw them lose the Europa League final to Chelsea 4-1 in Wroclaw. Betis were fantastic in the first half of Wednesday’s showpiece and deservedly led at half-time after the superb Isco teed up Abde Ezzalzouli for a ninth-minute opener. Indeed, Ezzalzouli’s strike […] The post Betis ´devastated´ by Chelsea Conference League collapse, says Pellegrini appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Maresca challenges Chelsea to use Conference League triumph as a launchpad
description: Enzo Maresca challenged Chelsea to make their historic Conference League triumph the start of an important period for the club. The Blues fought back to defeat Real Betis 4-1 in Wroclaw on Wednesday after trailing to Abde Ezzalzouli’s goal in a limp first half. Cole Palmer inspired the second-half turnaround, teeing up Enzo Fernandez and […] The post Maresca challenges Chelsea to use Conference League triumph as a launchpad appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews
